com.scvngr.levelup.core.model.qr

Class CodeVersionUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scvngr.levelup.core.model.qr.CodeVersionUtils

  • @LevelUpApi(contract=INTERNAL)
public final class CodeVersionUtils
extends Object
    Helper class to provide utilities for checking the version of QR code and its sub-codes.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • isValidCode

        public static boolean isValidCode(String code,
                  int expectedLength,
                  int codeVersionStartIndex,
                  int codeVersionEndIndex,
                  int expectedVersion)
        Utility method to check validity of the provided code. The version must be base 36 encoded.
        Parameters:
        code - the code string to check.
        expectedLength - the length the code must be.
        codeVersionStartIndex - the start index (INCLUSIVE) to get the code version from.
        codeVersionEndIndex - the end index (EXCLUSIVE) to get the code version from.
        expectedVersion - the version code that the code's version should be checked against.
        Returns:
        true if the code passes the expected length and version checks.

      • leftPadWithZeros

        public static String leftPadWithZeros(String toPad,
                      int finalSize)
        Left pads a string with zeros.
        Parameters:
        toPad - the string to pad with zeros.
        finalSize - the required size of the string. (cannot be negative)
        Returns:
        a string padded with zeros on the left.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if finalSize is negative.
